translation.en: the more I felt this was something
translation.zh: ‎就越觉得这件事

translation.en: that the public should be aware of
translation.zh: ‎就越觉得这件事 ‎应该让公众知道

translation.en: and that if the public were aware of it,
translation.zh: ‎如果公众知道了的话

translation.en: you know, people would not like the idea
translation.zh: ‎大家肯定不会喜欢

translation.en: of a major company behaving in this way.
translation.zh: ‎一家大公司有这种行为

translation.en: [Kristof] So I reached out to Pornhub pretty early on
translation.zh: ‎于是我一早就主动联络了Pornhub

translation.en: to speak to the executives,
translation.zh: ‎想跟管理层谈谈

translation.en: and Pornhub was not particularly responsive.
translation.zh: ‎但Pornhub并没怎么回应

translation.en: The CEO refused to speak to me.
translation.zh: ‎CEO拒绝与我对话

translation.en: But the more I explored,
translation.zh: ‎但我越是探究

translation.en: the more aghast I became
translation.zh: ‎越是感到惊恐

translation.en: because I found just too many cases of kids
translation.zh: ‎因为我发现有太多这样的孩子们

translation.en: whose worst moments were preserved in amber on Pornhub
translation.zh:
‎自己人生中最糟糕的时刻
‎被永久封存在了Pornhub上

translation.en: in ways that were gonna be devastating for the rest of their lives.
translation.zh: ‎这对他们今后的人生是毁灭性的

translation.en: It was about six months that I spent trying to get survivors to talk about it.
translation.zh:
‎我大约花了六个月的时间
‎试图让幸存者们跟我谈一谈

translation.en: This is, uh… This is Serena, the woman I, uh…
translation.zh: ‎这是塞琳娜 就是我…

translation.en: The young woman I wrote about.
translation.zh: ‎我报道里的那位女性

translation.en: Serena Fleites was a young woman
translation.zh: ‎塞琳娜·弗莱特斯 是一名年轻女性

translation.en: who told me her story, which was just devastating.
translation.zh:
‎她把她的故事告诉了我
‎真的很令人心碎

translation.en: At 14, she was an eighth grader
translation.zh: ‎她14岁时 在上八年级

translation.en: who had a crush on a boy who was a year older.
translation.zh: ‎喜欢上了一个男孩 比她年长一岁

translation.en: He asked her for a naked video,
translation.zh: ‎他要她发裸露视频

translation.en: and she sent him a naked video of herself.
translation.zh: ‎于是她就给他发了自己的裸露视频

translation.en: He asked for another. She sent another. Another after that.
translation.zh: ‎然后他又问她要 她发了 一个又一个

translation.en: Then kids started looking at her and smirking.
translation.zh: ‎然后孩子们开始冲着她坏笑

translation.en: Somebody put those videos on Pornhub.
translation.zh: ‎有人把那些视频放上了Pornhub

translation.en: One of them had 400,000 views.
translation.zh: ‎其中有一个被播放了四十万次

translation.en: She asked Pornhub to remove them.
translation.zh: ‎她要求Pornhub将视频移除

translation.en: Sometimes it did. Sometimes it didn't.
translation.zh: ‎有时候移除了 有时候没有

translation.en: And when it did remove them,
translation.zh: ‎而即便是视频被移除的那几次

translation.en: then somebody else would immediately upload it again.
translation.zh: ‎马上又会有别人把视频再传上来

translation.en: And Pornhub made money off this.
translation.zh: ‎而Pornhub却靠这个赚了钱

translation.en: They ran ads on this.
translation.zh: ‎在上面加了广告

translation.en: That was what drove me to write this piece.
translation.zh: ‎就是这件事促使我写了这篇文章

translation.en: [Stabile] So in December 2020,
the New York Times ran an op-ed by Nicholas Kristof
translation.zh:
‎《纽约时报》发布了一篇
‎尼古拉斯·克里斯托夫的评论员文章

translation.en: called "The Children of Pornhub."
translation.zh: ‎题为《被Pornhub毁掉的孩子》

translation.en: I read it the morning that it came out, and honestly, I thought,
translation.zh:
‎发布当天的早上 我就读了一遍 ‎说老实话 我当时心想：
‎“完全是光打雷不下雨”

translation.en: "This is all smoke, no fire."
translation.zh:
‎说老实话 我当时心想：
‎“完全是光打雷不下雨”

translation.en: Um… And so, I-- I didn't think much of it at first.
translation.zh: ‎于是我一开始没怎么多想

translation.en: [Kristof] "Pornhub prides itself on being the cheery, winking face of naughty,
translation.zh:
‎“Pornhub一直为自己
‎活泼逗趣的调皮形象而自豪

translation.en: the website that buys a billboard in Times Square
translation.zh: ‎这家网站购买了时代广场上的广告牌

translation.en: and provides snow plows to clear Boston streets."
translation.zh:
‎还提供除雪机
‎帮忙清理波士顿的街道”

translation.en: "It donates to organizations fighting for racial equality
translation.zh: ‎“它为争取种族平等的机构捐款

translation.en: and offers steamy content free to get people through Covid-19 shutdowns."
translation.zh:
‎还在新冠疫情期间提供免费色情内容
‎帮助人们打发被关在家里的时光”

translation.en: "That supposedly 'wholesome Pornhub'
translation.zh: ‎“这个看似‘暖心治愈的Pornhub’

translation.en: attracts 3.5 billion visits a month."
translation.zh: ‎每月能吸引35亿次访问”

translation.en: "More than Netflix, Yahoo, or Amazon."
translation.zh: ‎“比Netflix、雅虎或亚马逊还要多”

translation.en: "Pornhub rakes in money from almost three billion ad impressions a day."
translation.zh:
‎“每天近30亿次的广告曝光
‎让Pornhub赚得盆满钵满”

translation.en: "One ranking lists Pornhub as the 10th most-visited website in the world."
translation.zh:
‎“有一项排名将Pornhub
‎列为全世界访问量第十高的网站”

translation.en: "Yet there is another side of the company."
translation.zh: ‎“然而 这家公司还有另一面”

translation.en: "Its site is infested with rape videos."
translation.zh: ‎“其网站上充斥着强奸视频”

translation.en: "It monetizes child rape…"
translation.zh: ‎“通过利用强奸儿童…”

translation.en: Obviously, in the ensuing days, I was wrong.
translation.zh: ‎显然 在接下来的几天里 我被打脸了

translation.en: It became a phenomenon.
translation.zh: ‎文章被传遍了全网

translation.en: [Patriquin] The New York Times did what The New York Times does.
translation.zh: ‎《纽约时报》果然不是浪得虚名

translation.en: They have incredible resources.
translation.zh: ‎他们拥有难以置信的资源

translation.en: They spent an inordinate amount of time
translation.zh: ‎他们花了超乎寻常的时间

translation.en: and did a character-driven column.
translation.zh: ‎写了一篇以人物为主导的专栏

translation.en: It was a bombshell.
translation.zh: ‎一石激起千层浪

translation.en: [Perdue] I had left Pornhub at that point,
translation.zh: ‎那时我已经离开了Pornhub

translation.en: but I still work vaguely in the industry,
translation.zh: ‎但我的工作依旧跟这行有些许关联

translation.en: so obviously, I saw the article.
translation.zh: ‎所以我当然也看到了这篇文章

translation.en: It was everywhere. It was shared with everyone.
translation.zh: ‎简直是无处不在 大家都在分享

translation.en: Dozens of people sent it to me.
translation.zh: ‎有几十个人发来给我看

translation.en: I remember seeing this Twitter kerfuffle on my phone
translation.zh:
‎我记得我拿着手机
‎见证了这场Twitter上的唇枪舌剑

translation.en: and all the people talking about this article
translation.zh: ‎有好多好多人都在讨论这篇文章

translation.en: and then all the people responding, saying like, "This is bullshit."
translation.zh: ‎还有好多人回应：“这是在胡说八道”

translation.en: [Dreams] I just thought of it as another attack.
translation.zh:
‎我当时只把这件事
‎当成了对我的又一次攻击

translation.en: You know, I have so many attacks, personally, that I'm like,
translation.zh: ‎要知道 我受到过太多次人身攻击了

translation.en: "I can't take on that attack right now. Let me handle my own stuff first."
translation.zh:
‎我现在可没办法面对这样的攻击
‎让我先处理我自己的事吧

translation.en: [DeVille] It's a nightmare for us because when you present
translation.zh:
‎这对我们来说是一场噩梦 ‎因为当你将两件不相干的事
‎说成是紧密相关的

translation.en: two unrelated things as being closely related
translation.zh:
‎因为当你将两件不相干的事
‎说成是紧密相关的

translation.en: in a paper that everyone's going to believe,
translation.zh: ‎还是在一家所有人都会相信的报纸上

translation.en: what happens?
translation.zh:
‎会发生什么？
‎不用想你也知道会发生什么

translation.en: Well, exactly what you think would happen. And exactly what did happen.
translation.zh:
‎会发生什么？
‎不用想你也知道会发生什么 ‎而接下来发生的事也印证了

translation.en: [DeVille] The public sees it, and they are outraged
translation.zh: ‎公众看到之后 群情激奋

translation.en: because it is outrageous, and it is horrible,
translation.zh: ‎因为这种事确实令人愤怒 骇人听闻

translation.en: and it is something that nobody wants.
translation.zh: ‎没人希望发生这种事

translation.en: And then they say,
translation.zh: ‎接着 他们说：

translation.en: "That is trash, and we need to eliminate it."
translation.zh: ‎“这是垃圾 我们需要除掉它”

translation.en: [Akira] They neglect to see that
translation.zh: ‎他们没看清

translation.en: sex work and sex trafficking are two completely different things.
translation.zh: ‎性工作与性贩卖 ‎是两件截然不同的事

translation.en: Sex work, by definition, is done with consent,
translation.zh:
‎性工作 根据定义
‎就是要在征得同意后进行的

translation.en: and if it's not done with consent, it's rape.
translation.zh: ‎如果没有征得同意 就是强奸

translation.en: It's illegal, it's, um…
translation.zh: ‎那就是违法的 是…

translation.en: unethical, and that's not what we do.
translation.zh: ‎不道德的 我们可不是这么做事的

translation.en: [Kristof] "I don't see any neat solution."
translation.zh: ‎“我想不到一蹴而就的解决方案”

translation.en: "But aside from limiting immunity so that companies are incentivized to behave better,
translation.zh:
‎“只有限制公司的免责保护
‎才能激励其做得更好”

translation.en: here are three steps that would help."
translation.zh: ‎“下面的三步 应该能有所帮助：

translation.en: "One. Allow only verified users to post videos."
translation.zh: ‎一 只允许认证用户发布视频

translation.en: "Two. Prohibit downloads."
translation.zh: ‎二 禁止下载

translation.en: "Three. Increase moderation."
translation.zh: ‎三 增强审核”

translation.en: "Siri Dahl, a prominent porn star who does business with Pornhub,
translation.zh:
‎“西丽·达尔
‎一名与Pornhub合作的著名色情明星

translation.en: told me my three proposals are…"
translation.zh: ‎跟我说 我这三项提议…”

translation.en: "Insanely reasonable."
translation.zh: ‎非常之合理

translation.en: So Nick Kristof had contacted me
translation.zh: ‎没错 尼克·克里斯托夫联络了我

translation.en: asking for an interview about Pornhub.
translation.zh: ‎想做一个关于Pornhub的采访

translation.en: Ultimately, I told him everything I know to be true that is my experience.
translation.zh:
‎最终 我将自己
‎真实经历过的一切都告诉了他

translation.en: I'm a survivor of abuse myself,
translation.zh: ‎我自己也是虐待的幸存者

translation.en: um, which I told Nick Kristof in our phone interview.
translation.zh:
‎我在电话采访中
‎跟尼克·克里斯托夫说了

translation.en: I… told him about my own experience with sexual abuse,
translation.zh: ‎我把我自己被性虐待的经历告诉了他

translation.en: which happened before I was ever in the porn industry, and…
translation.zh: ‎那是在我进入色情影业之前发生的事

translation.en: I also communicated to him, like, one of my favorite things
translation.zh:
‎我也向他传达了这一行中
‎我最喜欢的一件事

translation.en: about the industry that I work in is the fact that we care about consent
translation.zh:
‎我也向他传达了这一行中
‎我最喜欢的一件事 ‎就是我们对征得同意是十分在乎的

translation.en: and the fact that I have full bodily autonomy at all times in this industry.
translation.zh:
‎还有在这个行业中
‎我一直都拥有对我身体的自主权

translation.en: Like, there's no question in my mind about that, and there never has been.
translation.zh:
‎在我心中 这根本就是毫无疑问的
‎从头到尾都没有怀疑过

translation.en: One of the things I was very clear with him about
translation.zh:
‎另外还有一个意思
‎我也非常清晰地向他表明了

translation.en: when he read those three steps is,
translation.zh: ‎当他读出那三步的时候 我就说

translation.en: "This is what people in the porn industry have been asking for."
translation.zh:
‎这就是我们色情影业内部的人
‎一直以来在要求的

translation.en: But if we admit that it's a moderation problem,
translation.zh:
‎但如果我们要承认
‎这是在审核上出了问题

translation.en: then we have to admit it's a problem that's Internet-wide, which it is.
translation.zh:
‎那我们就必须承认
‎这是整个互联网都存在的问题 ‎事实也正是如此

translation.en: Because there's far more instances of child sexual abuse material
translation.zh: ‎因为这些被举报的性虐儿童素材

translation.en: being reported on, like, Facebook and mainstream social media
translation.zh: ‎在Facebook和其他社交媒体上

translation.en: than there is on actual porn websites.
translation.zh: ‎远比色情网站上的要多

translation.en: [Kristof] "If PayPal can suspend cooperation with Pornhub,
translation.zh: ‎“如果贝宝能中止与Pornhub的合作

translation.en: so can American Express, Mastercard, and Visa."
translation.zh: ‎那美国运通、万事达卡和Visa也能”

translation.en: [Dahl] And when he outlined those steps, if he had said,
translation.zh: ‎当他列出那几步时 假如他也说了

translation.en: "Do you think it's reasonable for Pornhub
translation.zh: ‎“你觉得这样做合理吗？

translation.en: to lose their ability to process payments?"
translation.zh: ‎让Pornhub失去处理支付的能力？”

translation.en: I would have been like, "No."
translation.zh: ‎我肯定会说：“不合理”

translation.en: 'Cause it would be near impossible for someone to upload illegal content
translation.zh:
‎因为如果有人想
‎通过认证模特的账户上传非法内容

translation.en: via a verified model account,
translation.zh: ‎几乎是一件不可能的事

translation.en: which is the only way it would have to be uploaded for them to sell it
translation.zh: ‎要想用Pornhub上的支付处理来卖钱

translation.en: using the payment processing on Pornhub.
translation.zh: ‎就只有这一种办法

translation.en: So all it does is affect my ability
translation.zh: ‎所以这么做的话 ‎只会影响我和业界同行们谋生的手段

translation.en: and the ability of people in my industry to make a living.
translation.zh: ‎只会影响我和业界同行们谋生的手段

translation.en: So Mastercard and Visa pulled their processing from Pornhub.
translation.zh:
‎于是万事达卡与Visa
‎停止了Pornhub的支付处理

translation.en: The idea that somebody was claiming, "Oh, children are being sold on your site
translation.zh:
‎道理很简单 有人在声称： ‎“噢 你的网站上
‎有人在用信用卡贩卖儿童”

translation.en: using credit cards,"
translation.zh:
‎“噢 你的网站上
‎有人在用信用卡贩卖儿童”

translation.en: for a global brand like that, was like,
translation.zh: ‎对于一个国际平台 反应肯定是：

translation.en: "We can't be associated with this. We can't have a whiff of this."
translation.zh:
‎“我们绝不能跟这种事有联系
‎一点瓜葛也不能有”

translation.en: [Patriquin] So Pornhub came out and removed a bunch of content.
translation.zh:
‎于是Pornhub站了出来
‎移除了一堆内容

translation.en: Which is not to say that those videos that they took down were non-consensual.
translation.zh:
‎这并不代表那些被移除的视频
‎全都是非自愿的

translation.en: The vast majority of cases they probably weren't.
translation.zh: ‎其中的大部分应该都经过了的

translation.en: But less content equals less profit.
translation.zh: ‎但内容越少 利润就越少

translation.en: So, the fact that they did that when they did it,
translation.zh:
‎所以 他们的这个做法
‎还有他们这么做的时机

translation.en: suggests to me that that's the nuclear option.
translation.zh: ‎让我觉得 这是他们的核选项

translation.en: You get rid of this stuff when it's absolutely necessary.
translation.zh:
‎逼不得已时的最后手段
‎才是把这些东西删掉

translation.en: Before then, let it ride 'cause we're making money on it.
translation.zh:
‎在那之前 就随它去吧
‎因为我们在靠这个挣钱呢

translation.en: [Stabile] In some ways, they took on the wrong company.
translation.zh:
‎从某种程度上说
‎他们找错了公司施压

translation.en: Pornhub doesn't actually sell a whole lot of content directly on its site.
translation.zh:
‎Pornhub其实
‎不太在网站上直接卖内容

translation.en: Most of the money that Pornhub made
translation.zh: ‎Pornhub赚到的大部分钱

translation.en: came from banner advertising or affiliate sales,
translation.zh: ‎大都来自横幅广告与链接推广

translation.en: neither of which require a credit card to operate on the platform.
translation.zh: ‎两者都不需要信用卡就能进行

translation.en: So the people who really got hurt were individual performers.
translation.zh:
‎所以最后真正受伤害的
‎是一个个表演者

translation.en: The small people selling direct to the consumers
translation.zh: ‎是那些直接卖片给顾客的小人物

translation.en: because that's where the consumers were.
translation.zh: ‎因为只有顾客才会用到信用卡

translation.en: Porn performers like me depend on platforms like Pornhub to pay…
translation.zh: ‎像我这样的色情演员 ‎依赖像Pornhub这样的平台来支付…

translation.en: You're taking food out of people's mouths.
translation.zh: ‎你们这是在从人们的嘴里抢食

translation.en: This is how people pay their rent and pay their bills.
translation.zh: ‎人们要靠这个缴房租 支付日常花销

translation.en: Mastercard pulling payment processing from Pornhub is not helping one victim.
translation.zh:
‎万事达卡撤走Pornhub的支付处理
‎没有帮到一个受害者

translation.en: …terrified that they're gonna do this to other sites…
translation.zh: ‎害怕他们会对其他网站也会这么做…

translation.en: …should have a right to post online and exist online.
translation.zh:
‎我们应该有权在网上发布
‎在网上存在

translation.en: Please listen to us.
translation.zh: ‎请倾听我们的声音

translation.en: We need to support sex workers. We need to--
translation.zh: ‎我们需要支援性工作者们 我们…

translation.en: People that are uploading child pornography
translation.zh: ‎上传儿童色情作品的人

translation.en: are not content creators.
translation.zh: ‎可不是内容创作者…

translation.en: [woman] I got hired at MindGeek in August 2019,
translation.zh: ‎2019年8月 我在MindGeek入职

translation.en: and I transitioned to a role in HR in 2020.
translation.zh:
‎然后在2020年
‎我转岗去了人力资源部

translation.en: The article came to my attention, when I went to work "virtually" that day,
translation.zh:
‎那天我“远程”上班时
‎这篇文章引起了我的主意

translation.en: um, everybody was talking about it.
translation.zh: ‎大家都在讨论这件事

translation.en: Um, and…
translation.zh: ‎然后…

translation.en: I just remember wondering,
translation.zh: ‎我记得自己在心里嘀咕…

translation.en: "How much of it is true?"
translation.zh: ‎这其中有多少是真的？

translation.en: But, um,
translation.zh: ‎但是…

translation.en: there was really no way for me to know.
translation.zh: ‎我也没办法获知真相

translation.en: [Burgoyne] I was pretty reliant on what management was willing to say about it,
translation.zh:
‎我基本上只能依靠管理层
‎看他们愿意说什么

translation.en: and it wasn't a whole lot.
translation.zh: ‎可他们惜字如金

translation.en: All we were told was, "None of it's true."
translation.zh: ‎大家被告知：“这些全都是假的”

translation.en: But it's this big article in The New York Times,
translation.zh: ‎可《纽约时报》登了这样的重磅文章

translation.en: and it's very hard to reconcile those things.
translation.zh: ‎让人很难知道究竟该信什么

translation.en: But I think what they were really responding to was the tone of the article.
translation.zh: ‎但我觉得他们最反对的是文章的基调 ‎那篇文章带着一种极度谴责的态度

translation.en: How it was so accusatory
translation.zh: ‎那篇文章带着一种极度谴责的态度

translation.en: and painting them like they were doing it on purpose.
translation.zh: ‎把事情描述成 是他们故意这么做的

translation.en: That was really the part that they minded.
translation.zh: ‎这点才是他们最在意的

translation.en: And that was really a shame because I think it would have been better
translation.zh:
‎这样真的挺遗憾的

translation.en: in that moment to give some guidance.
translation.zh: ‎如果当时能站出来解释一下的话

translation.zh: ‎但我想他们可能是心存侥幸

translation.en: everything was gonna calm down and blow over.

translation.en: [anchor] The website Pornhub is promising to take action.

translation.zh:
‎第一项改变

translation.en: Now pursuant to the motion adopted
translation.zh: ‎根据委员会于2020年12月11日星期五

translation.en: by the committee on Friday, December 11th, 2020,
translation.zh: ‎根据委员会于2020年12月11日星期五 ‎表决采纳的动议

translation.en: the committee is resuming its study on the protection of privacy

translation.en: and reputation on platforms such as Pornhub.
translation.zh: ‎对于隐私及名誉的保护的课题

translation.en: [Patriquin] So the parliamentary hearings were held in winter 2021,
translation.zh:
‎于是议会于2021年冬天

translation.en: looking into issues of privacy around companies like MindGeek.
translation.zh:
‎调查MindGeek这类公司

translation.zh:
‎基本上就是调查MindGeek

translation.en: and "What the hell's going on?"
translation.zh: ‎想搞清楚到底是怎么回事

translation.en: Good afternoon. My name is Feras Antoon.
translation.zh: ‎下午好 我的名字叫法拉斯·安图恩

translation.en: I'm the chief executive officer of Les Entreprises MindGeek Canada.
translation.zh:
‎我是加拿大
‎MindGeek公司的首席执行官

translation.en: With me is David Tassillo, chief operations officer,
translation.zh:
‎与我一同出席的是

translation.zh:
‎还有视频分享平台产品管理部
‎副主席科里·厄曼

translation.en: As a leader in this industry, we share the committee's concern
translation.zh:
‎作为这个行业中的领导者 ‎我们与委员会一样十分担忧

translation.en: about the spread of unlawful content online
translation.zh:

translation.en: and about the non-consensual sharing of intimate images.
translation.zh: ‎与在非自愿的情况下分享的亲密照片

translation.en: It goes against everything we stand for at MindGeek and Pornhub.
translation.zh:
‎这一切完全违背了
‎我们MindGeek和Pornhub的立场

translation.en: So on December 14th,
80% of your content came down from your site.
translation.zh: ‎贵站80%的内容都被下架了

translation.en: Is that correct?
translation.zh: ‎是这样吗？

translation.en: Uh, I don't know about 80%,
translation.zh: ‎是不是80%我不知道

translation.en: but yes, a large portion of unverified-user-uploaded content was removed.
translation.zh:
‎但未认证用户上传的内容中
‎确实有一大部分被移除了

translation.en: Illegal content?
translation.zh: ‎违法内容？

translation.en: No. I said unverified uploaders.
translation.zh: ‎不 我说的是 未认证上传者

translation.en: That's the-- We only have content today from verified uploaders.
translation.zh:
‎就是… 此时此刻
‎我们只有认证上传者的内容

translation.en: The content we removed is because we do not have--
translation.zh: ‎我们移除的内容 是因为我们没有…

translation.en: It was uploaded by people who were not verified.
translation.zh: ‎是未经认证的人所上传的

translation.en: Do you have a specific number on the amount of content that was removed?
translation.zh:
‎关于被移除内容的数量
‎你有具体的数字吗？

translation.en: [Antoon] I would s--
translation.zh: ‎要我说…

translation.en: It's in the ballpark of nine to ten million.
translation.zh: ‎大致有九百至一千万

translation.en: And we're making it so that we want everyone that uploads to our site
translation.zh:
‎我们已经做出了改变
‎我们想让每一个在我们网站上传的人

translation.en: to basically have a… We want to have ID on them,
translation.zh:
‎基本上要有…
‎我们想要有他们的身份证件

translation.en: so we know who they are, so we can add further deterrents
translation.zh:
‎这样我们就知道他们是谁
‎好让我们在未来进一步增加

translation.en: to them doing illegal activity, and we hope
translation.zh: ‎对违法行为的阻遏能力 ‎我们希望全世界那些为人们

translation.en: people that are providing adult entertainment
translation.zh: ‎我们希望全世界那些为人们

translation.en: and any form of entertainment for people in the world follow our lead.
translation.zh:
‎提供成人娱乐或是任何形式娱乐的人
‎也能跟上我们的脚步

translation.en: Has MindGeek or any of its at least 48 subsidiaries
translation.zh: ‎MindGeek或其旗下的至少48个子公司

translation.en: ever monetized child sexual abuse and non-consensual material?
translation.zh:
‎是否利用过儿童性虐待
‎或是非自愿的素材牟利？

translation.en: Our standards are very clear. We won't allow anything to do with CSAM.
translation.zh:
‎我们的标准十分明确
‎我们不允许任何儿童性虐待素材

translation.en: We want nothing to do with non-consensual.
translation.zh: ‎或是任何非自愿的东西

translation.en: It is possible that people committing crimes
translation.zh: ‎如果某些犯罪人士绕过了我们的系统

translation.en: are able to circumvent our systems,
translation.zh: ‎那是有可能的

translation.en: similar to security on a home or security at a bank.
translation.zh:
‎就像是家庭安防系统
‎或是银行的安保系统

translation.en: You put multiple levels of security in place and deterrents in place,
translation.zh:
‎虽然你已设置了
‎层层的安全措施与阻遏手段

translation.en: but if a criminal wants to commit a crime, they will try and circumvent the system.
translation.zh: ‎可如果有罪犯想要犯罪 ‎他们会想办法绕过这个系统

translation.en: We are constantly adding new systems and better systems
translation.zh:
‎我们一直在增加
‎新的系统与更好的系统

translation.en: and trying to further it, to not only deter but to stop.
translation.zh:
‎精益求精 不仅要阻遏
‎还要追求完全阻断

translation.en: This has been a constant evolution in our company.
translation.zh: ‎这是我们公司内不断进化的一部分

translation.en: We were, um… had human moderation available on our sites
translation.zh: ‎我们的网站上很早就有了人工审核

translation.en: when it was a word that wasn't even-- It didn't even exist.
translation.zh: ‎那时候这个词本身都还不存在

translation.en: When Facebook and any of the other main platforms in the world never used it.
translation.zh:
‎那时候Facebook
‎和世界上其他主流平台也从仍未应用

translation.en: These were all things that we started. We weren't public about it,
translation.zh:
‎这些都是我们最先开始做的
‎我们只是没有公开而已

translation.en: but these are things we did since the beginning.
translation.zh: ‎但这些都是我们从一开始就在做的事

translation.en: [Perdue] There were moderators.
translation.zh: ‎以前确实有审核员

translation.en: I don't really know how that worked.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道具体是怎么个机制

translation.en: I know that there was
translation.zh: ‎我知道原来…

translation.en: more content being uploaded onto the site, so I actually can't talk, really.
translation.zh: ‎有更多的内容被上传到网站上 ‎抱歉 我不能讲这个

translation.en: This is really getting into shady legal territory for me here.
translation.zh: ‎再说下去我可能会有法律上的麻烦了

translation.en: -[interviewer] Okay. -Um…
translation.zh: ‎好的

translation.en: [interviewer] To start, can you just tell me why you've decided
translation.zh: ‎首先 能否请你告诉我 ‎你为什么决定要分享你的故事？

translation.en: to share your story?
translation.zh: ‎你为什么决定要分享你的故事？

translation.en: I think the company could have done more
translation.zh: ‎我认为公司本可以做得更多

translation.en: to prevent certain things and chose not to.
translation.zh: ‎来阻止某些事 却选择了不这么做

translation.en: And only really changed some things after it got in trouble.
translation.zh:
‎只有在惹了麻烦后
‎才做出了些许改变

translation.en: [voice disguised] I was a moderator. I worked for less than two years.
translation.zh: ‎我以前是一名审核员 ‎我工作了不到两年

translation.en: Some of the moderation happened in Canada.
translation.zh: ‎有一些审核工作是在加拿大进行的

translation.en: Most of it happened in Cyprus.
translation.zh: ‎而绝大部分都是在塞浦路斯

translation.en: When I worked there, there was a little over 30 moderators.
translation.zh:
‎我在那里工作的时候
‎大概有30多个审核员

translation.en: Every moderator had to review, um, 700 videos per day,
translation.zh: ‎每个审核员每天要审查700个视频

translation.en: but it was expected for us to do more.
translation.zh: ‎但那只是我们的及格线

translation.en: [Pinter] Each of these moderators were tasked with viewing
translation.zh:
‎每个审核员的职责
‎是在8小时工作时间内

translation.en: 800 to 1,000 videos per eight-hour shift.
translation.zh:
‎每个审核员的职责
‎是在8小时工作时间内 ‎观看完800到1000个视频

translation.en: And that's impossible.
translation.zh: ‎那是不可能做到的

translation.en: So, of course, they were fast-forwarding, skipping through.
translation.zh: ‎所以他们当然会一直快进 跳着看

translation.en: No sound, which is key because sometimes
translation.zh:
‎不开声音 这点挺关键的 ‎因为有时候
‎视频里的女人和儿童在哭嚎和喊叫

translation.en: the women and-- or children in the video are crying, yelling,
translation.zh:
‎因为有时候
‎视频里的女人和儿童在哭嚎和喊叫

translation.en: saying, "No," saying, "Stop," and they're not catching any of that.
translation.zh:
‎说着“不要”和“停”
‎他们是一点也不会听到的

translation.en: [moderator] We were scrubbing through videos as fast as we could.
translation.zh: ‎我们都是尽可能快地跳进着看视频的

translation.en: Even if we thought that we were being diligent with our work,
translation.zh: ‎即便我们自以为已经够谨慎了

translation.en: we would still miss a few videos every now and then.
translation.zh: ‎还是会偶尔错过几个视频

translation.en: [Pinter] They proudly boasted that every single video is reviewed.
translation.zh:
‎他们得意地吹嘘
‎每一个视频都是被审阅过的

translation.en: But, to put it in perspective,
translation.zh: ‎但类比一下的话

translation.en: Pornhub has traffic similar to these big social media websites.
translation.zh:
‎Pornhub的浏览量
‎跟那些大型社交媒体网站是差不多的

translation.en: Ninth, you know, most-trafficked website in the world, conservatively.
translation.zh: ‎保守估计是全世界流量第九的网站

translation.en: Facebook had 15,000 moderators,
translation.zh: ‎Facebook有一万五千名审核员

translation.en: and that was for a site that isn't primarily centered around sexually explicit content, right?
translation.zh:
‎而且那还是给一家
‎不主打色情露骨内容的网站 对吧？

translation.en: And they still have 15,000 moderators who, we find out, are very overwhelmed.
translation.zh:
‎即便如此 也有一万五千名审核员
‎而且我们得知他们也忙不过来

translation.en: [moderator] I can't really tell from a video the age of somebody.
translation.zh: ‎我无法依靠视频判断出某人的年龄

translation.en: It's a really hard thing to determine if a 17 year old is more than 18.
translation.zh:
‎但我们还是必须要做决定
‎这个人是17岁呢 还是超过了18岁

translation.en: They could be 14 or they could be 19.
translation.zh: ‎他们有可能14岁 也有可能19岁

translation.en: Basically, we would just guess,
translation.zh: ‎基本上我们只能靠猜

translation.en: then my manager would decide if the video would be
translation.zh:
‎然后会由我的经理来决定
‎要不要把这个视频永久地撤下来

translation.en: taken down for good or if it will go live again.
translation.zh:
‎然后会由我的经理来决定
‎要不要把这个视频永久地撤下来 ‎还是让它重新上线

translation.en: The rules constantly changed.
translation.zh: ‎规则总是在不断地变化

translation.en: [woman] When you're operating a business like a pornography website,
translation.zh:
‎当你在经营一门
‎像色情网站这样的生意时

translation.en: you just have to have incredibly stringent compliance, content moderation,
translation.zh:
‎你必须非常严格地遵从规则
‎进行内容审核

translation.en: and user restrictions involved in that.
translation.zh: ‎还有限制与之相关的用户

translation.en: I can't overstate that enough, especially when it's an online business.
translation.zh:
‎这些我就算再怎么强调也不过分
‎尤其是讨论一家网络企业的时候

translation.en: So NCMEC is a private, nonprofit organization.
translation.zh: ‎NCMEC是一个私有的非营利组织

translation.en: We have a very basic mission, which is to help find missing children,
translation.zh:
‎我们有一个非常基本的使命
‎就是帮助寻找失踪的儿童

translation.en: reduce child sexual exploitation, and prevent child victimization.
translation.zh:
‎减少对儿童的性剥削
‎阻止儿童成为受害者

translation.en: We've a lot of companies and nonprofit organizations that report to us.
translation.zh:
‎有许多公司和非营利组织
‎会向我们汇报

translation.en: So a survivor very well might be working with an organization
translation.zh:
‎如果有名幸存者
‎很可能已经在找某个组织帮忙了

translation.en: and say, "My image, my video, is here, on Pornhub, on another website."
translation.zh:
‎他说：“我的照片、我的视频
‎在Pornhub或者其他网站上”

translation.en: And we would facilitate that nonprofit making a report on that incident
translation.zh:
‎我们会帮助那个非营利组织
‎代表那名客户或是在帮助的幸存者

translation.en: on behalf of the client or survivor that they're working with.
translation.zh: ‎写一份关于这起事件的报告

translation.en: [Pinter] So a survivor came to us with what happened to her.
translation.zh:
‎有一名幸存者来找我们
‎在她身上发生了这么件事

translation.en: She went on a date with someone who was much older.
translation.zh: ‎她跟一名比她年长许多的人约了次会

translation.en: She was a minor.
translation.zh: ‎她当时是个未成年人

translation.en: He drugged and raped her and filmed her.
translation.zh: ‎他给她下了药 强奸了她 还录了下来

translation.en: And the next thing you know, the video is on Pornhub.
translation.zh:
‎然后这个视频
‎马上就跑到Pornhub上去了 ‎（被骗的少女）

translation.en: She requested multiple times over the years to have it removed.
translation.zh: ‎多年来她多次请求将视频移除

translation.en: But the whistleblower we spoke to
translation.zh: ‎但跟我们联络的吹哨人说

translation.en: actually said that they would have a backlog of, like, six months.
translation.zh: ‎但跟我们联络的吹哨人说 ‎他们时常手上积压着六个月的工作量

translation.en: [moderator] We have thousands of take-down requests.
translation.zh: ‎我们会收到成千上万的移除请求

translation.en: We don't really go through them in time.
translation.zh: ‎我们没办法及时看完

translation.en: Many videos that should have been taken down
translation.zh: ‎许多应该被移除的视频

translation.en: stayed up for months.
translation.zh: ‎会在上面待上好几个月

translation.en: [Souras] So there is a US law that requires online companies
translation.zh:
‎有一条美国法律要求 ‎所有网络公司
‎从定义上说 是电子服务提供商

translation.en: that are defined as an electronic service provider
translation.zh:
‎所有网络公司
‎从定义上说 是电子服务提供商

translation.en: to report apparent child pornography to NCMEC
translation.zh: ‎一经发现明显是儿童色情作品的素材

translation.en: when they become aware of it on their platform.
translation.zh: ‎必须立即向NCMEC报告

translation.en: There are over 1400 companies registered with NCMEC.
translation.zh: ‎超过1400家公司在NCMEC注册了

translation.en: From Microsoft, to Facebook, to Google, to Dropbox, to Snapchat, to Twitter,
translation.zh:
‎从微软到Facebook
‎从谷歌到Dropbox ‎到Snapchat 到Twitter

translation.en: all of these companies are registered with NCMEC.
translation.zh: ‎所有这些公司 都在NCMEC注册了

translation.en: And MindGeek registered to report to NCMEC in March 2020.
translation.zh:
‎而MindGeek在注册向NCMEC汇报
‎是在2020年的3月

translation.en: But the reporting statute only applies to US companies.
translation.zh:
‎但这条报告的法规
‎只对美国公司适用

translation.en: So international companies have no obligation to register with NCMEC,
translation.zh: ‎所以国际公司没义务要在NCMEC注册

translation.en: to report child sexual abuse, uh, material
translation.zh: ‎不需要将儿童性虐待的素材

translation.en: to our CyberTipline or to have any involvement with us whatsoever.
translation.zh:
‎报告给我们的电子举报系统
‎或是跟我们有任何关系

translation.en: [Pinter] What Pornhub would do when NCMEC would request a takedown is…
translation.zh:
‎当NCMEC要求下架视频时
‎Pornhub会这么做…

translation.en: In any other circumstance, if child pornography was on a website,
translation.zh:
‎在其他情况下
‎如果网站上有儿童色情作品

translation.en: and the website was alerted, and they took it down,
translation.zh:
‎而这家网站也意识到了
‎他们把视频撤下后

translation.en: and you tried to go to that link, to that exact web address,
translation.zh:
‎如果你再试图去访问那个链接
‎访问一模一样的网址

translation.en: it either wouldn't be there or it'd say, "Page doesn't exist" or "Error."
translation.zh:
‎要不就是视频不在了
‎要不就是“页面不存在”或是“错误”

translation.en: For Pornhub, you would see the entire page.
translation.zh:
‎而在Pornhub上
‎你能看到整个页面都在

translation.en: The video would just be disabled, and it would have a message that says,
translation.zh:
‎视频只是被禁止播放了
‎上面会有条信息写道：

translation.en: "Video is removed at the request of NCMEC."
translation.zh: ‎“视频根据NCMEC要求已被移除”

translation.en: But all the metadata would be there.
translation.zh: ‎可所有的元数据都仍然在

translation.en: So you would see the title, the history of all the comments over the years,
translation.zh:
‎就是说你能看到标题 看到历史
‎还有多年来所有的评论

translation.en: you'd see how many views it had, and you would see related videos.
translation.zh:
‎你能看到这个视频有多少阅览量
‎还能看到相关视频

translation.en: So, "Oh, you were searching for this young, abused teen video?"
translation.zh:
‎“噢 你在搜索这个
‎被虐待的年轻少女的视频呀？”

translation.en: "Well, unfortunately, this was removed by NCMEC,
translation.zh: ‎“哎呀 太可惜 已经被NCMEC移除了

translation.en: but don't worry, we have all of these similar videos."
translation.zh:
‎但请你别担心
‎我们这里还有许多类似的视频”

translation.en: And so, not only would they keep people on their site,
translation.zh:
‎这样一来
‎他们不仅把人留在了网站上

translation.en: but that would still be generating data and hits on all those terms and keywords.
translation.zh:
‎但那个视频依旧会创造数据
‎跟许多关键词搭配上

translation.en: So they lost nothing in terms of SEO by removing that.
translation.zh:
‎所以尽管他们移除了视频
‎但在搜索引擎优化方面什么也没失去

translation.en: So they're actually still profiting from this known child pornography
translation.zh:
‎他们依旧在依靠
‎这个确定的儿童色情作品牟利

translation.en: even when they disable the video.
translation.zh: ‎即便他们禁止了视频的播放

translation.en: And all the while, it's being distributed to the masses,
translation.zh: ‎而在此过程中 视频正在发布给大众

translation.en: never to be removed again.
translation.zh: ‎再也别想被移除了

translation.en: Because that's the truth.
translation.zh: ‎因为这就是事实

translation.en: Once this is on the Internet, it's almost impossible to remove.
translation.zh:
‎一旦这东西被放上了网络
‎就几乎不可能被删除掉了

translation.en: These websites face no accountability, no requirements.
translation.zh: ‎这些网站不负责任 没有要求

translation.en: and so even if you get some websites to remove,
translation.zh: ‎所以即便你成功地让某几家网站移除

translation.en: others are going to distribute it.

translation.zh:
‎塞琳娜 非常感谢你愿意来到
‎我们的委员会面前讲出自己的故事

translation.en: Uh, we'll start with you.
translation.zh: ‎我们先从你开始

translation.en: I… I had messaged Pornhub to get the video taken down.
translation.zh:
‎我给Pornhub发信息
‎要求将视频撤下来

translation.en: I pretended to be my mother.
translation.zh: ‎我假装是我的母亲

‎我说：“嘿 刚才是我的女儿

‎“这是儿童色情作品

‎然后他们…他们回…

translation.en: and then once they finally responded, they're like, "Okay, we'll take it down."
translation.zh:
‎等他他们终于回复的时候
‎他们说：“好的 我们会把它下架”

translation.zh: ‎接着他们又等上了两周

translation.en: before they finally did take it down.
translation.zh: ‎最后才终于将视频下架了

translation.en: And, um, doing my research, I was told that, uh,
translation.zh: ‎我自己在调研的时候 我听说

translation.zh:
‎当某个视频在他们网站上

translation.zh: ‎因为在视频被下架后的一周后

translation.zh: ‎它又被重新上传了

translation.en: And it'd always be uploaded over and over and over again.
translation.zh: ‎然后就这样一遍又一遍地上传

translation.en: No matter how many times I got it taken down,
translation.zh: ‎无论我让它下架多少回

translation.en: it'd be right back up again.
translation.zh: ‎立马又会被传上去

translation.en: [sniffs] So that was the whole reason I ended up reaching out to Mike.

‎我是位于曼哈顿的

translation.zh:

translation.en: Uh, but that wasn't enough.
translation.zh: ‎但这还不够

translation.en: They incorporated into that business
translation.zh: ‎他们在商业模型中融入了

translation.en: child porn, trafficked porn, rape videos… To make money.
translation.zh:
‎儿童色情作品、性贩卖作品
‎还有强奸视频来赚钱

translation.en: So today, we sued the owners of MindGeek, and we sued the executives.
translation.zh:
‎所以今天我们起诉了
‎MindGeek的老板和高管

translation.en: And if executives like that end up going to jail,

translation.en: So our goal is to incentivize the adult industry
translation.zh: ‎所以我们的目标是激励 ‎成人产业只销售合法产品

translation.en: to only sell legitimate product.
translation.zh: ‎成人产业只销售合法产品

translation.zh:
‎对网络色情业来说
‎这是一个分水岭吗？

translation.zh: ‎整个行业都将被整治

translation.en: Hello, Mike Bowe.
translation.zh: ‎喂 迈克·鲍伊

translation.en: Hello. Hello.

translation.zh: ‎她只是动动手指将东西发出去 ‎她就是这么一种不可阻挡的力量

translation.zh: ‎她就是这么一种不可阻挡的力量

translation.en: "Monsanto of porn."
translation.zh: ‎“色情界的孟山都公司”

translation.en: "MindGeek's racketeering enterprise."
translation.zh: ‎“MindGeek的非法勾当企业”

translation.en: "It's just like The Sopranos."
translation.zh: ‎“就像《黑道家族》一样”

translation.en: [Stabile] "Appropriately dubbed, 'The Monsanto of Porn,'
translation.zh:
‎“被合理地称为
‎’色情界的孟山都公司‘

‎受他们的雇佣

translation.en: "Over the course of the next year, MindGeek's press relations
translation.zh:
‎“在接下来的一年中
‎MindGeek的公关部门

translation.en: and social media organization

‎按照事先准备好的话术

translation.zh:

translation.zh:

translation.en: That's-- That is absolute lies.

‎我是其中一名站出来的模特

translation.en: and on my own social media

translation.en: about the misinformation

translation.zh: ‎当初我对媒体说话的时候 我还… ‎担心Pornhub会不满意呢

translation.zh: ‎担心Pornhub会不满意呢

translation.zh:
‎“社交媒体最优化 ‎简称SMO

translation.zh:
‎简称SMO
‎是该企业不可或缺的一部分”

translation.zh:
‎“作为其SMO的一部分
‎在认为有必要时 MindGeek利用了

translation.zh:
‎“该网络包含了
‎数家公益非营利组织

translation.zh: ‎比如言论自由联盟

translation.en: MindGeek is a significant contributing member of the Free Speech Coalition,
translation.zh:
‎MindGeek确实是
‎言论自由联盟的主要赞助成员之一

translation.en: but prior to the Pornhub article, I'd never spoken to anybody
translation.zh:
‎但在那篇Pornhub文章之前 ‎我从未跟MindGeek的外联队伍

‎我从未跟MindGeek的外联队伍
‎有过任何交流 我都不知道他们是谁

translation.en: It's one thing to say, "Oh, we have evidence,"

translation.zh:
‎或是：“发生了这么一件事

‎但据我所知

translation.en: Most of it is hearsay and secondhand information

‎有些甚至连一点来源都没有
‎他们只是在做无端的揣测

translation.zh: ‎“该企业对于保密的极度重视

‎从其对于寻找潜在告密者

translation.en: "This ubiquitous 'Bro Club' term included,
translation.zh: ‎“这种无处不在的兄弟会式结盟

translation.zh:
‎包含的不仅是

translation.zh: ‎也包含了那些在内部发声反对的人”

translation.zh: ‎“哪怕只有一名兄弟会成员

translation.zh: ‎怀疑某人在告密 就足以阻止其晋升

translation.zh: ‎最终导致其被彻底逼出公司”

translation.en: "Such individuals would either be frozen out and elect to leave,
translation.zh:
‎“这样的人
‎不是通过冷处理被逼得主动离开

translation.en: be set up to fail in staged assignments,
translation.zh: ‎被故意安排在虚假任务中刁难

translation.en: or simply be told that there was a consensus that they should be let go
translation.zh:
‎或是被告知
‎大家一致同意其应该被开除

translation.zh: ‎完全没有任何的解释和原因”

translation.en: Well, this I can really relate to. Uh… [scoffs]

translation.zh:
‎我感觉他们是嗅到了

translation.zh: ‎但与此同时 我也觉得…

translation.en: if I hadn't been treated the way that I had,

translation.zh: ‎显然 有非自愿的素材

translation.zh:
‎被上传到一个大型平台上

translation.en: and I would never say otherwise because that is truly
translation.zh: ‎对此我是坚信不疑的 ‎因为这件事本身确实是令人惊恐的

translation.zh: ‎因为这件事本身确实是令人惊恐的

translation.en: and even me, like an ex-employee,

translation.zh:
‎因为我知道Pornhub被当成了

translation.zh: ‎而我很想为色情产业辩护

‎因为我知道那些批评

translation.zh: ‎所以当人们说：

‎那是当然得了

‎面对这种说法 我们还能怎么说？

translation.en: Miss Mickelwait, I-- I-- um…
